name: Behold Your Memories
description:
Where did you place your memories of your childhood? do you care about how you remember your favorite moments as a child?

Every place you are from, every thing you used to use, every person you used to play with, are now placed in your memories, but not every time is show by perspective in your day by day memories...

And what object could remind your sincere feel of happinnes of childhood? and what thing could frame every object

Photos...

Design process and Concept:

This game design process was limited by two constrains related to mechanics, in this case, these design limitation were:

  •  Lord of time: the game change depending on the time of the day you play
  •  Free of language limitation: the game can be understood regardless of the language

The game has a life time of three days that starts exactly when you play for first time, so be think your moves and what matters to be framed

IMPORTANT NOTE: This game is not about an specific objective or mission, just to be here and try to catch some memories, and as always, to not "forget" your precious memories, as they could vanish in that dark space of forgetfulness

Keep in mind that the game will change depending of the time you play, so, in that way, please be sure to play regularly along 3 days in a row

Controls:
Move - WASD
Camera control - Mouse
Toggle camera - Right click
Take photo - Left click

PD: This prototype is an educational project of mechanics and decisions design class

Developers:

  • Alejandro Serna Gómez
  • Jordan Bolivar Quintero

Majority of the 3D models and assets were taken of TurboSquid, CgTrader and SketchFab
